item.title: Report E-2024080293
item.description:
Report E-2024080293

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-15T15:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 6-7 ounces of Zinsser® B-I-N® Shellac-Base Primer White Tintable released from (2) 1-gallon metal pails due to the pallet tipping over while attempting to move it with a forklift. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.
